item.description: Enjoy food, fitness, joy, lifestyle, and budget tips for natural joy, wellness, and weight maintenance with food-prep-demos / samples and fitness demo by Dr. Rev. Mara More, DD, ND, NT, LC. Hands on participation in food prep and fitness is encouraged. Enjoy! :) RSVP* for Address, Info, possible shuttle from MBTA train station, and to be added to Host's Private Guest List.
